content.text:
# Analysis of Main Target Image

## Count & Layers
- Total blocks: 6 blocks
- Layers: 2 layers (red base layer and orange top layer)

## Spatial Relationships
- Base Layer: Two red arch blocks placed side by side forming a tunnel-like structure
- Top Layer: Four orange blocks arranged on top of the base
  - Two rectangular orange blocks placed side by side on top of the red arches
  - Two triangular orange blocks forming a roof-like configuration on top of the rectangular blocks

# Selected Blocks from Dictionary

Based on the target structure, I need the following blocks:
- Block 1: Red arch block (left side of base)
- Block 2: Red arch block (right side of base)
- Block 10: Orange cube block (two of these for the middle section)
- Block 11: Orange triangular wedge (two of these for the roof)

# Assembly Order

```
{
    Step1: Move block with index 1
    Step2: Move block with index 2
    Step3: Move block with index 10
    Step4: Move block with index 10
    Step5: Move block with index 11
    Step6: Move block with index 11
}
```

This assembly sequence starts with placing the red arch blocks side by side to form the base, then adds the two orange cubes on top of them, and finally positions the two triangular wedges to create the roof-like structure at the top.
